title: Support Us
copy: Support comes in so many different forms; we would love to help you craft a relationship that works for you. For further information, please get in touch using one of the email addresses below. Membership and Annual Fund: membership@artic.edu Luminary (annual gifts of $3,000 or more): luminary@artic.edu Corporate Support: corporaterelations@artic.edu Foundation Support: aicinstitutionalphilanthropy@artic.edu For inquiries regarding gifts of art, please email artdonations@artic.edu .
